title: Roasted Chicken
ingredients: whole chicken, lemons, garlic, olive oil, dried thyme, salt, pepper, parsley
instructions: Preheat oven. Stuff chicken with lemon and garlic. Rub with oil, garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper. Roast. Garnish with parsley.

title: Vegetarian Chili
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, bell pepper, carrots, zucchini, kidney beans, black beans, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, chili powder, ground cumin, salt, pepper, optional toppings
instructions: Sauce vegetables. Add beans, tomatoes, broth, and spices. Simmer. Serve with optional toppings
